DOC.brief_summary: A lead-in cohort ~20 patient primary secondary myelofibrosis previously treat 1 Janus kinase inhibitor enrol single-agent glasdegib evaluate safety tolerability . Following lead-in , phase 2 , double blind , 2-arm study , randomize 2:1 oral single-agent glasdegib versus placebo 201 patient resistant intolerant ruxolitinib .
